title: He's My Mate
description: Charlene Craig, a shy young girl, moved to Bellemont with hopes for a fresh start. Sheâ€™s trying to live an isolated life this time, a life far away from all her troubles.However, here came the revered chemistry teacher, Jonathan Garner. His classes always attracted female students to the front row, and many vied for his attention, except Charlene.Deep inside, both had insatiable hunger toward each other. Despite the mutual attraction, Charlene was hell bent on staying as far away from Jonathan as she possibly could.Was Charlene keeping a secret? What conflicts await in Bellemont? How will Charlene and Jonathan make this work?Will this be a story of betrayal or of triumph?
author: K. Konyana
